features.situation: on all HT rolls related to drinking

8cb115c9-342e-4a54-a826-bc1b6592db51.name: Sympathy
8cb115c9-342e-4a54-a826-bc1b6592db51.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

8725809e-ff12-4071-b1a4-f5c4fa1bf2a1.name: Sympathy
8725809e-ff12-4071-b1a4-f5c4fa1bf2a1.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

a142ab7a-f6a9-4b2d-9c87-d1690d110cba.name: Sympathy
a142ab7a-f6a9-4b2d-9c87-d1690d110cba.notes: Death of one party kills the other

87b28004-38d7-4d34-acff-d33778afacd6.name: Sympathy
87b28004-38d7-4d34-acff-d33778afacd6.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

features.situation: from others
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from others
from others
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from others
from others
from others
from others
from others

2e6e77d0-20f3-4dca-9611-3062e92f859c.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
2e6e77d0-20f3-4dca-9611-3062e92f859c.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from others
from others
from others
from others

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from others
from others

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from others
from others
from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)
to Influence rolls

477c1844-c3b9-4409-99b6-96e5733fbc45.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

7111e471-69fd-440e-860a-eeb470e48d10.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

169e0277-e450-4994-b906-045174888051.name: Cultural Familiarity (any)
169e0277-e450-4994-b906-045174888051.notes: Do not suffer the normal -3 penalty for unfamiliarity

features.situation: to skill rolls any time you take an unnecessary risk (in the GM’s opinion)
from others in social situations when you have a chance to plan your attire in advance
to someone else's reaction bonus from others when you put together their outfit

9d7dccf8-1834-4a89-8eb1-8a9814dae7f5.name: Luck
9d7dccf8-1834-4a89-8eb1-8a9814dae7f5.notes: Usable once per hour of play

4e575889-394c-4e6b-85f2-d8fcd1b979d0.name: @Who: Individual with 150% of PC's starting points@

14769b3c-d08e-4c03-a5ff-56b274dec704.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000 times starting wealth@

e9a02e1b-1dce-4687-98fa-5c62562c7032.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

a58353a7-9d9f-452e-8b39-b616ba2703b8.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

77c7cca5-4265-40cc-9458-b5ecbc1e9f5d.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

26851210-b84e-4bf5-833e-c4f946b3fc7d.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000000 times starting wealth@

bf7eda69-e181-4e90-b557-a16e1367750a.name: @Who: A national government or giant multi-national organization@

da6bd864-31fe-43eb-a339-605f6a5752c7.name: Equipment
da6bd864-31fe-43eb-a339-605f6a5752c7.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

6e39caaf-68f7-4274-b180-b65fd7d6d505.name: Equipment
6e39caaf-68f7-4274-b180-b65fd7d6d505.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

4632a021-71da-42da-92cd-80b62f510129.name: Special Abilities
4632a021-71da-42da-92cd-80b62f510129.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

5d59cd17-8232-4dd0-b326-72fd55939b79.name: People Affected
5d59cd17-8232-4dd0-b326-72fd55939b79.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

features.situation: from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

733dec10-2e79-4415-995c-fd92fb6ae404.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
733dec10-2e79-4415-995c-fd92fb6ae404.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

1d7ec59f-1e15-4aef-afb0-4025d93f9cc3.name: Effects: Highly Addictive (-5 on withdrawal roll)

45fd7970-52e7-48e1-bc11-179c3f82ea4e.name: Effects: Totally Addictive (-10 on withdrawal roll)

059238a9-a293-477b-adce-74c736848edc.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
059238a9-a293-477b-adce-74c736848edc.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

280e8fd9-7ba7-4e1c-ba8b-4b1522ae0bb0.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
280e8fd9-7ba7-4e1c-ba8b-4b1522ae0bb0.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

48c2a8c8-dc61-4331-ac07-e01caf25bc22.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
48c2a8c8-dc61-4331-ac07-e01caf25bc22.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

75f84014-77ed-4e44-a9b6-e66d1c4e5fcb.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
75f84014-77ed-4e44-a9b6-e66d1c4e5fcb.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

6af6c90e-6119-4af3-980f-38e6d7a4a33e.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
6af6c90e-6119-4af3-980f-38e6d7a4a33e.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

74f48b36-865d-4995-b4c5-ed636823051e.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
74f48b36-865d-4995-b4c5-ed636823051e.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

f425040e-70a6-40b5-8d41-33c5f3250582.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
f425040e-70a6-40b5-8d41-33c5f3250582.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

30537b06-16bd-47f0-9092-3a62515d6a20.name: Combat Paralysis
30537b06-16bd-47f0-9092-3a62515d6a20.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

features.situation: from like-minded extroverts
or worse from sober-minded citizens (GM discretion)
from pious folk

fc335198-e793-41e9-bd7f-f0625c249150.name: Cowardice
fc335198-e793-41e9-bd7f-f0625c249150.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

ad427352-7ac3-415a-8416-0c85ae842c55.name: Curious
ad427352-7ac3-415a-8416-0c85ae842c55.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

092d9b1e-25f5-4b28-aaa0-93298118a3a8.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
092d9b1e-25f5-4b28-aaa0-93298118a3a8.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

125c22bc-c1f8-469f-a619-d535e4044391.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
125c22bc-c1f8-469f-a619-d535e4044391.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

2fcaccf8-117d-4500-b002-91bd53322839.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
2fcaccf8-117d-4500-b002-91bd53322839.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

4339986b-a622-4835-ad6d-b9c881933be1.name: Gluttony
4339986b-a622-4835-ad6d-b9c881933be1.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

258cf204-9683-4d5e-bd14-765553a0145e.name: Greed
258cf204-9683-4d5e-bd14-765553a0145e.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

19e3a996-329e-45e6-bdcf-a703d0c081be.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
19e3a996-329e-45e6-bdcf-a703d0c081be.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

694e877c-a3cc-4ec4-a9ab-44907f42c06e.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
694e877c-a3cc-4ec4-a9ab-44907f42c06e.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

2ada9f50-7833-45d3-8b67-c3c335be8a93.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
2ada9f50-7833-45d3-8b67-c3c335be8a93.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

220bbb67-4d04-4f4b-bd9a-ac8f3872289d.name: Honesty
220bbb67-4d04-4f4b-bd9a-ac8f3872289d.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

35c14378-8b11-420a-ac1f-d553a3fdd53e.name: Impulsiveness
35c14378-8b11-420a-ac1f-d553a3fdd53e.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

features.situation: from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

89b37470-b82e-444c-a01a-8889d47193fe.name: Laziness
89b37470-b82e-444c-a01a-8889d47193fe.notes: Your chances of getting a raise or promotion in any job are halved. If you are self-employed, halve your monthly pay.

4baa3a00-33fe-404d-a715-a0158e72cdc9.name: Lecherousness
4baa3a00-33fe-404d-a715-a0158e72cdc9.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have more than the briefest contact with an appealing member of the sex you find attractive, at -5 if this person is Handsome/Beautiful, or at -10 if Very Handsome/Very Beautiful. If you fail, you must make a “pass” using whatever wiles and skills you can bring to bear.

940028f2-b2e6-4b89-9bda-486c3a030ea5.name: Low Pain Threshold
940028f2-b2e6-4b89-9bda-486c3a030ea5.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from "macho" individuals
to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

9a5dd768-b0e2-4441-ab2f-bc9d25a4f561.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
9a5dd768-b0e2-4441-ab2f-bc9d25a4f561.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

aed7f88b-aa69-4a93-afc8-16736732e2ae.name: Miserliness
aed7f88b-aa69-4a93-afc8-16736732e2ae.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

a95d44c4-472f-4fe2-94ac-da9238bd72b7.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
a95d44c4-472f-4fe2-94ac-da9238bd72b7.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

1b7b0870-3922-4035-bc62-62783f7c8fd4.name: Necrophobia (Death)
1b7b0870-3922-4035-bc62-62783f7c8fd4.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

a5f5bd1a-90c6-4ad6-9f89-07374b16c992.name: Obsession
a5f5bd1a-90c6-4ad6-9f89-07374b16c992.notes: varies; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

989469a8-ebf9-467c-9183-63a3f3956592.name: Overconfidence
989469a8-ebf9-467c-9183-63a3f3956592.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

bf17fa27-4048-4765-87b4-cbe21c29a61c.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
bf17fa27-4048-4765-87b4-cbe21c29a61c.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not “serious harm” unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved – particularly if they are “ordinary folks.”

fc990fb9-3994-4c52-9f73-04ddd6414294.name: Pacifism: Cannot Kill
fc990fb9-3994-4c52-9f73-04ddd6414294.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may never do anything that seems likely to kill another. This includes abandoning a wounded foe to die “on his own”! You must do your best to keep your companions from killing, too. If you do kill someone (or feel responsible for a death), you immediately suffer a nervous breakdown. Roll 3d and be totally morose and useless for that many days. During this time, you must make a Will roll to offer any sort of violence toward anyone, for any reason.

7a6e82a5-b970-4e6d-b924-5706a5ae1e24.name: Pacifism: Reluctant Killer
7a6e82a5-b970-4e6d-b924-5706a5ae1e24.notes: You are psychologically unprepared to kill people. Whenever you make a deadly attack (e.g., with a knife or a gun) against an obvious person whose face is visible to you, you are at -4 to hit and may not Aim. If you cannot see the foe’s face (due to a mask, darkness, or distance, or because you attacked from behind), the penalty is only -2, save in close combat. You have no penalty to attack a vehicle (even an occupied one), an opponent you do not believe is a person (including things with Horrific or Monstrous appearance), or a target you can’t actually see (e.g., a set of map coordinates or a blip on a radar screen). If you kill a recognizable person, the effect on you is the same as for Pacifism: Cannot Kill. You have no problem with your allies killing; you may even supply ammo, loaded weapons, and encouragement! You just can’t do the killing yourself.

bf2dedb9-deda-4f05-a7f3-5965b6890594.name: Pacifism: Self-Defense Only
bf2dedb9-deda-4f05-a7f3-5965b6890594.notes: You only fight to defend yourself or those in your care, using only as much force as necessary (no pre-emptive strikes allowed!). You must do your best to discourage others from starting fights.

53d40aee-5859-4d14-a8b3-d0e0d5033eea.name: Pacifism: Total Nonviolence
53d40aee-5859-4d14-a8b3-d0e0d5033eea.notes: You will not lift a hand against another intelligent creature, for any reason. You must do your nonviolent best to discourage violent behavior in others, too. You are free to defend yourself against attacks by animals, mosquitoes, etc.

bbb800b2-46de-4b95-9abb-24ca9af20186.name: Post-Combat Shakes
bbb800b2-46de-4b95-9abb-24ca9af20186.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

0d12c373-b8f5-4113-a3fd-91d1d8524252.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
0d12c373-b8f5-4113-a3fd-91d1d8524252.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

5fcd3ac9-3722-4149-80ba-87f326f6bc24.name: People Affected
5fcd3ac9-3722-4149-80ba-87f326f6bc24.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

431a2414-745b-4fce-bc94-7ce080d066d0.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
431a2414-745b-4fce-bc94-7ce080d066d0.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

c2f8f4ca-1c19-4159-aa44-c5736dfd9aad.name: Selfish
c2f8f4ca-1c19-4159-aa44-c5736dfd9aad.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

0b321789-9c72-481b-a129-c180b8a25250.name: Short Attention Span
0b321789-9c72-481b-a129-c180b8a25250.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must maintain interest in something for an extended period of time, or whenever a distraction is offered. If you fail, you automatically fail at the task at hand.

features.situation: on all self-control rolls one hour after you awaken from any sleep longer than a one-hour nap
to IQ and IQ-based skills one hour after you awaken from any sleep longer than a one-hour nap
additional penalty whenever the GM assesses attribute penalties for missed sleep
from others

24e112a6-a3e4-4cc1-8852-b1d803367af6.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
24e112a6-a3e4-4cc1-8852-b1d803367af6.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

1a945ab7-a182-48dc-8c7a-1549314b6dce.name: Truthfulness
1a945ab7-a182-48dc-8c7a-1549314b6dce.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

2ea69b5a-902e-4681-ac45-a1dea0855dae.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
2ea69b5a-902e-4681-ac45-a1dea0855dae.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

10344d64-75da-4458-ae63-62650fc745a1.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
10344d64-75da-4458-ae63-62650fc745a1.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

8e4cd418-6761-4e63-88ef-215849fcdc9d.name: Unfit
8e4cd418-6761-4e63-88ef-215849fcdc9d.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

4594372d-99bf-4ed7-aa5f-74fe08183855.name: Unluckiness
4594372d-99bf-4ed7-aa5f-74fe08183855.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

317dbdf7-f6d2-45d1-953c-098b7724e526.name: Very Unfit
317dbdf7-f6d2-45d1-953c-098b7724e526.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

086c071f-78e5-492e-922f-9e5d8ba3c164.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
086c071f-78e5-492e-922f-9e5d8ba3c164.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

9b36e770-ce69-4579-ba56-dbe7413e3f16.name: Spend 4 extra points in primary or secondary skills
